meaningMnemonic: If everyone is acting <kanji>solemn</kanji> and <kanji>strict</kanji> then you should probably pay special attention to the <vocabulary>gravity</vocabulary> of the situation you're in. Don't start playing the trumpet when you're supposed to be bowing your head!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
